name: Space Shooters (DEMO)
description:
DISCLAIMER: THIS GAME IS JUST A DEMO AND WAS MADE FOR THE LUDUM DARE 51 WITH THE THEME OF 10 SECONDS.  Sorry it not that good good because I only had 2 days

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Space shooters is a game where your earth's last hope, You need to shoot the incoming invaders and save earth you have 10  seconds to destroy a wave before they go see what high score you can get.
